title: Noonu Atoll Haven with Signature Dining & World-Class Spa
description:
This five-star retreat is a haven of tranquillity, boasting an undisturbed location on the Noonu Atoll offering an unforgettable Maldivian escape. Dine on spectacular seafood at the overwater Bodumas restaurant or indulge in a signature chocolate hour to sweeten your escape.

Spend your days exploring the waters around the resort with complimentary non-motorised water sports, including kayaks and stand-up paddle boards, or discover the vibrant underwater world with a dive at the resort's PADI dive centre. For a change of pace, experience a curated treatment at Sun Spa by Healing Earth and let yourself melt away.
